title: Wolves and Monsters
description: When Toni Renford marries millionaire Michael Clark, it is initially a marriage of convenience; with his money, she can secure the land she needs to protect her precious wolves in Siberia. Having spent years with them and caring for them, they are everything to her. But when the pack comes under attack from violent and monstrous assassins, the wolves are no longer the feared predator, and Toni must fight for her own life as well as theirs...
author: Tania Nichols
